info.name: Eldarya rearranging style | by Sads
info.description: A simple style that "improves" the current design of the website by erasing some borders and rearranging some pages (inventory, library, episodes...) to change into a less "childish" theme. + basically all the yellow stuff is gone except for the bank.
info.additionalInfo:
This is the second version !

So it could have some issues, obviously. if you wanna help me, you can install it and tell me what doesn't work by contacting me directly on Eldarya FR (Sads) or MCL US (Kenshuo)

15.10.16 > first try posting it on userstyles eheh
28.07.17 > new version since they changed the inventories and everything
28.10.17 > new version since they changed the episodes page
